channel.title: Guide of RuneScape
channel.description:
[center][font=comic sans ms]Hello members of MoparScape, this guide will be ever expanding and basically our own little guide to RuneScape, if you would like to contribute to this guide please message me through a private message or you can reach me at my msn (Runemaker-xandrewx@hotmail.com)[/font][/center]
[center][b]Index[/b] [font=comic sans ms][b]Chapter one:[/b][/font] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,499019.0.html][font=comic sans ms]Item lending for profit[/font][/url]. [b][font=comic sans ms]Contributed by user:[/font][/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=502987]Andrew Ferguson[/url][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms][b]Chapter two:[/b][/font] [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,499048.0.html][font=comic sans ms][/font]Money Making[/url]. [b][font=comic sans ms]Contributed by user:[/font][/b] [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=481392]Drubrkletern[/url][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms]This topic is mainly a gate way to the topic that will be coming out soon, if you wish to contribute a chapter to this guide please contact me in one of the ways stated above. Contributors will be expected to update their chapters often and publish actuate information about the game.[/font][/center]

item.title: Guide of RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

vManlyMan:

What do you plan on being in each chapter? For example do you want different skills for every chapter?

Basically this will be everything, I’m currently working on a details guide to lending various items for profit, guides can be skills, quests, money making guides, ext.
